page.title: 15Normid Hypermarket Talke
page.content: In 1975 Normid Cooperative Society opened a giant hypermarket on part of the site of the old colliery.It is an enormous store selling groceries like an ordinary supermarket,and also furniture,gardening equipment,D.I.Y products,magazines and books,clothes and electrical goods.There is also a filling station with nine petrol pumps. It used to have an area outside where second hand cars were sold but this closed down after a while.Now they are building a car wash.Most shoppers travel to Normid in their cars and so the store has a carpark for over one thousand cars.At Christmas time this can be full.Normid employs 300 people. It is open every day except Sunday.When they are all working it has 26 check outs.At Christmas time the store manager lets our school stand outside the store entrance and sing carols.
